dummy_section.server_name: You can put your server name here

general.bot_status: Example status (keep in mind that it'll have 'Watching' prefix, i.e. 'Watching Example status'

categories._comment: Put your channel categories IDs here, you can seperate them by ',' for including multiple category channels, but remember to keep them in [] brackets

levels._comment: level_channel = channel, that will display leaderboard; target_message = embed, that will display leaderboard; offtopic_channel = channel = that bot will send message to upon levelling

temp_messages._comment: Specify a channel ID and time in seconds, after message will be deleted (default 86400 = 24h)
